p: The third session was set in the municipality of La Orotava. This municipality has a population of about 41,000 inhabitants ( ISTAC, 2017a). As in San Crist√≥bal de La Laguna, an open invitation call of citizens was organised. 18 people attended the event. The educational level of the participants was, generally, high. However, unlike the second session, this one was attended by people who did not have CC expertise, albeit interested in the subject.
